Class WPListActivity

java.lang.Object

          com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.app.WPListActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view.WPContextMenu.OnContextItemSelectedListener, com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.view.WPMenu.OnMenuItemSelectedListener
public class WPListActivity
extends WPActivity

Mirror of android.app.ListView for the internal WP7-style ListView.

Method Detail

onListItemClick

protected void onListItemClick(com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.ListView l,
                               View v,
                               int position,
                               long id)
This method will be called when an item in the list is selected. Subclasses should override. Subclasses can call getListView().getItemAtPosition(position) if they need to access the data associated with the selected item.

Parameters:
l - The ListView where the click happened
v - The view that was clicked within the ListView
position - The position of the view in the list
id - The row id of the item that was clicked

onRestoreInstanceState
